NAME quick flash

COL 0

ITM 2
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
NAME front-door
DLG FRONT_DOOR_LOCKING

DLG CAT_DLG
"""
{cycle
  - {shk}{rbw}I'm a cat{rbw}{shk}
  - I also have a longer dialog to force wrapping for testing's sake
}
"""

DLG CAR
"""
{cycle
 - Can't leave yet.
 - I just got here.
}
"""

DLG CARBOOT
Good thing I keep a torch in the boot.(js "coneTightness=0.69;sprite[names.sprite.get('forestblock')].room=null;")

DLG ROADBLOCK
"""
{cycle
 - I'm not headed out there on foot.
 - Nuh-uh.
 - No way.
 - I'm not walking all the way home.
}
"""

DLG SPR_1
"""
{sequence
  - Not headed out there in the dark. 
  - I've got a torch in the boot.
  - I should go get my light.
}
"""

DLG FOREST_CHATTER
"""
{sequence
  - Ugh, not much of a path...
  -
  - Can't believe anyone lives out here...
  -
  - This better be worth the trip...
  - 
}
"""

DLG QUICK_FLASH
(js "coneTightness=.9;setTimeout(function(){coneTightness=.69;},20);")

DLG FRONT_DOOR_LOCKED
"""
{cycle
  - *{shk}rattle{shk}*{br}*{shk}rattle{shk}*
  - It's locked.
}I'll need to find another exit.
"""

DLG FRONT_DOOR_LOCKING
*{shk}SLAM{shk}*

VAR a
42
